lexUnit.name: portable.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: able to be easily carried or moved.

sentence.text: To the left of the sofa is yet another table with more papers , a small portable tape-recorder for the occasional piece of dictation and a bottle of Malvern which I take neat when thirsty .
